mapper.select: select p.brand, p.price, p.detail, p.category, p.product_id, p.product_country, i.product_size from products p left OUTER JOIN inventories i ON i.product_id = p.product_id where p.product_id = #{productId}
select count(*) from reviews where review_id > 0

select review_id,regdate,contents,product_id,member_id from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(reviews review_id)*/ rownum rn,review_id,regdate,contents,product_id,member_id from reviews where rownum <= (#{page}*#{amount})) where rn > (#{page}-1)*#{amount} order by review_id desc
select inventory_id,product_id,product_size,quantity, stocked_date,product_color,discontinued from inventories where inventory_id=#{inventoryId}
SELECT DISTINCT product_color,product_size FROM inventories WHERE product_id = #{productId} GROUP BY product_color,product_size order by product_color
